general.gigTitle: develop your business website using wordpress

sellerCard.description: I specialize in Website Development and Designing, with expertise in WordPress, Elementor &  Woo Commerce Development, PSD to WordPress conversion, and Responsive Web Design. Over the past 6 years, I have honed my skills in these areas. I am meticulous in understanding client requirements, allowing me to deliver projects that precisely match their vision. I am constantly seeking improved solutions to optimize and enhance the performance of my projects. Keeping up with the latest technology is a priority for me to stay current in my field.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to provide for you to start working on my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You'll need to provide your business information, logo, content for the pages, any specific images you want to use, and access to your hosting account if you have one. If you don't have these ready yet, we can discuss how to proceed during our initial consultation.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How long does it take to build a website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The completion time varies based on the package selected. The Basic Package typically takes up to 7 days, the Standard Package up to 14 days, and the Premium Package up to 21 days. These timelines can be adjusted based on your specific requirements and feedback.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I see the design before the website goes live?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I will develop your website on my staging server. You will have the opportunity to review it and request adjustments before it goes live on your domain.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide hosting and domain services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I do not provide hosting and domain registration services directly, but I can recommend reliable providers and assist you with the setup process as part of my service.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What does 'fully responsive' mean?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: A fully responsive website means that your site will look great and function flawlessly on all devices, including desktops, tablets, and smartphones. This ensures a positive user experience no matter how your visitors access your site.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is included in 'lifetime maintenance support' in the Premium Package?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Lifetime maintenance support includes regular updates to WordPress, themes, and plugins, along with minor tweaks and corrections to ensure your site remains in top working condition. This does not include major redesigns or overhauls, which can be discussed separately.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is your revision policy?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Each package comes with a set number of revisions. Basic includes one round of revisions, Standard includes two, and Premium offers three. Additional revisions can be made available at an extra cost.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What happens if I'm not satisfied with the final website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Customer satisfaction is my top priority. I will work closely with you throughout the development process to ensure your needs are met. If you're still not satisfied with the final product, we can discuss additional revisions or utilize the money-back guarantee provided in certain conditions.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer services to improve the SEO and loading speed of the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, in the Premium Package, I include SEO-friendly setup and optimizations to ensure the website is fast-loading. This includes optimizing images, leveraging caching, and using SEO-friendly URL structures among other techniques.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you integrate third-party services or APIs?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can integrate most third-party services and APIs as long as they support integration. This includes payment gateways, CRM systems, email marketing services, and more. Please provide the details during our initial discussion to ensure compatibility.

reviews.comment: great working with Hassan, very punctual and delivered on time.

I am delighted to wholeheartedly recommend Hassan as an exceptional platform for anyone seeking to create a stunning and functional website with ease. Having extensively explored various website builders, I can confidently affirm that Hassan stands out as a remarkable choice for individuals, businesses, and organizations looking to establish a strong online presence.
Transformed my ideas into a stunning digital reality. Quick, professional, and highly skilled. A+!

A pleasure to work with Hassan He skilfully captured my brand's identity, delivering a stunning and functional website. Highly recommend for exceptional WordPress work. I am thrilled with the final result, and I confidently endorse this designer to anyone seeking a standout WordPress website.

reviews_snippet.comment: Hassan saved my agency today! He completed custom work that other developers said was not possible. I will use him for all of my website needs from now on! I love that he realized my request was urgent and responded right away. I've watched a lot of developers' work. Hassan was fast and on point!

Im thrilled to share my heartfelt appreciation for the exceptional web development services provided by Hassan. From initial consultation to the final implementation, he displayed a remarkable level of professionalism and technical prowess.
Hassan was very knowledgeable.  He was very patient and good in communicating on this project.  The job was done with the outmost satisfaction.  Will highly recommend him.
I'm delighted with my work, he surely knows how to get his work done on time and correctly! I would surely recommend him at any time. Also, I will come back to him. No doubt! Thank you again. Love!

Hassan posses excellent skills especially for Word Press Website build-up. He understands the requirements very well and can do anything requested of it in blink of an eye. Would definitely recommend him to my circle and also will involve him in future projects.
